dct_title_s: Map of the lower portion of Miami River Basin showing availability of underground water
dct_alternative_sm: Ohio water plan inventory. Underground water resources. Miami River Basin (Lower Portion)
dct_description_sm: Prepared by ALFRED C. WALKER, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water
Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.
Scale bar lower right corner of map.
Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the lower Miami River Basin and quality of underground water.
